akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title XI, § 1131(11), 60 Stat. 1036

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 71. Repealed. Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title XI, § 1131(11), 60 Stat. 1036
Section, R.S. § 1714, related to construction of powers and duties of consular officers.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective three months after Aug. 13, 1946, see act Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title XI, § 1141, 60 Stat. 1040.
